item.title: At least 10 potholes in one area!, 30th January
item.description:
Impossible to dodge the pot holes due to there being SO many on one stretch of road, I drive through them daily and can never avoid them because of the way they are spread out, it's going to cause damage. This stretch of road is always horrendous for them, it needs resurfacing before it causes any more damage. Already have a bulge on my tyre from them. These particular ones have been here for a considerable amount of time now
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: With ally way light gone and the second ligh really dull, 30th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Marchant Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
